Record.Value: In this lesson, you will learn the basics of mining planetary resources and how to turn them into useful ingots.

Welcome back, Cadet! Our first task today is to equip the {THING:ItemTablet}. The {THING:ItemTablet} can be used to display information on atmospherics and networks, as well as an encyclopedia or a beacon tracker.
Open the {SLOT:Back} with {KEY:BackSlot} to find the {THING:ItemTablet}
Insert the {THING:CartridgeTracker} by dragging it from the {SLOT:Back} onto the into the equipped {THING:ItemTablet} icon, or click the {THING:ItemTablet} to open its own UI window.
Turn on the {THING:ItemTablet} using the {KEY:ToggleHandPower} key.

Now we can get to extracting resources from the planet’s surface. We will need to equip the {THING:ItemMiningBelt} from the {SLOT:Back}. Swap the {THING:ItemToolBelt} for the {THING:ItemMiningBelt} and get the {THING:ItemMiningDrill} from the {THING:ItemMiningBelt}.
Cadet, we've marked a few good locations with beacons to get you started. Use the tablet and the scroll wheel to select a beacon. Then go to the location and mine some {THING:ItemCoalOre}.

Well done Cadet! {THING:ItemCoalOre} will run your solid fuel generators when power is low at night. Next, you will need to find Iron. {THING:ItemIronOre} is a key component in most items and an essential ore. We have marked a location on your tablet.

Another fine job, Cadet. The next location may be harder to reach - it's high up on a hill, so you’ll need your Jetpack to reach it. Toggle it off and on using the {KEY:Jetpack} key. We have marked the {THING:ItemCopperOre} on your tablet.
Finally, you will need some {THING:ItemGoldOre} for electronics. We have marked a location on your {THING:ItemTablet}. Hint: Use {KEY:Jetpack} to travel quickly.

That should be all we need for now. Now head back to base and get smelting. The {THING:StructureArcFurnace} is used to smelt ores into useful ingots. Try smelting some {THING:ItemIronOre} into an {THING:ItemIronIngot}. We've given you access to an Ore Container if you need more resources.
Smelt {THING:ItemIronOre} by placing it in the arc furnace and activating it.
